hero.title: From the table to your wallet,
hero.subtitle: Payverge makes dining payments borderless, fair, and effortless. Guests scan, pay in USDC, and you're paid instantly. No banks. No friction.

vision.title: Hospitality deserves
vision.description1: For too long, restaurants, caf√©s, and bars have been chained to slow, expensive, and outdated payment systems. Fees eat into margins. Settlements take days. Tips get lost in the process. Guests are forced into clunky card machines and awkward bill splits.
vision.description2: At Payverge, we believe payments should be as effortless as the meal itself. We're not building just another payment processor,

instant.title: Instant Settlement
instant.description: Get paid in USDC the moment your guests finish their meal.

fair.title: Fair Fees
fair.description: No hidden costs. No surprise charges. Just transparent, low fees.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Accept payments from anywhere in the world, in any currency.

features.title: Three steps to transform your business

scan.title: Guests Scan
scan.description: Your guests simply scan a QR code at their table to view your menu and place orders.

pay.title: Pay in USDC
pay.description: Secure, instant payments in USDC. No card readers, no cash handling, no delays.

settle.title: You Get Paid
settle.description: Funds arrive in your wallet instantly. No waiting, no holds, no surprises.

waitlist.title: Be among the first to experience the future of hospitality payments
waitlist.subtitle: Join our waitlist and get early access to Payverge when we launch.

success.title: Welcome to the Early Partner Program! üöÄ
success.message: Thanks for joining! We'll contact you with special pricing details and early access to Payverge.

roadmap.title: We're just getting
roadmap.description: Payverge will roll out with restaurants, caf√©s, and bars worldwide. We're working closely with early partners to shape the future of hospitality payments.

platform.title: Beyond payments, a complete
platform.subtitle: Everything you need to run a modern restaurant, plus crypto payments

menus.title: Beautiful Digital Menus
menus.description: Automatically generated menus with photos, real-time pricing, and instant updates across all tables

reviews.title: Google Reviews Integration
reviews.description: Automatically request reviews after successful payments to boost your online reputation

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track sales, crypto payment trends, and make data-driven decisions for your business

staff.title: Staff Management
staff.description: Transparent crypto tip distribution and performance analytics for your team

orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Kitchen display system and order tracking from menu to payment

qr.title: Instant QR Codes
qr.description: Generate table QR codes instantly and update them in real-time

social.title: Built for
social.subtitle: From coffee shops to fine dining, crypto payments for every hospitality business

hospitality.title: Hospitality-First
hospitality.description: Designed specifically for restaurants, caf√©s, and bars

footer.tagline: Payverge operates exclusively on USDC. No banks. No borders. Just better payments.

footer.tagline: Transforming hospitality payments with blockchain technology

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
Communicate with you about your account

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your information with:
sharing.note: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: "Service" refers to the Payverge platform and all related services
"User" refers to any individual or entity using our services
"Investment" refers to tokenized vehicle ownership through our platform

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.intro: To use our services, you must:
requirements: Have legal capacity to enter into agreements
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

structure.title: Investment Structure
structure.content: Investments are structured as tokenized ownership of vehicle assets, managed through smart contracts on the blockchain.

period.title: Investment Period
period.content: Investment periods vary by vehicle fleet, typically ranging from 2-5 years with options for early exit under certain conditions.

setup.title: Setup Fees
setup.content: One-time setup fees may apply for:

deposit.title: Security Deposits
deposit.content: Security deposits may be required for:

income.title: Income Distribution
items: Rental income is distributed monthly based on your ownership percentage
Income is paid in USDC to your registered wallet address
Tax reporting documents are provided annually
Income may vary based on vehicle utilization and market conditions

vehicle.title: Vehicle Management
items: All vehicles are professionally managed by our partner operators
Regular maintenance and inspections are conducted
Insurance coverage is maintained at all times
Vehicle performance and utilization data is available to investors

termination.title: Term and Termination
items: Investment terms are specified in individual vehicle contracts
Early termination may be possible subject to market conditions
Final distributions occur after vehicle sale and expense settlement
Platform reserves the right to terminate services with 30 days notice

risks.title: Risks and Disclaimers
items: All investments carry inherent risks including potential loss of principal
Vehicle values may fluctuate based on market conditions
Rental income is not guaranteed and may vary
Regulatory changes may impact investment returns
Platform technology risks including smart contract vulnerabilities

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes will be resolved through arbitration in Dubai.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these terms, please contact us:

withdrawalHistory.subtitle: Track all your earnings withdrawals
